meanings.definition: The quality or state of being weird.
meanings.sent1: The weirdness of the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: Her weirdness is what makes her so unique.
meanings.sent3: The weirdness of the clown's outfit made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The weirdness of the old house gave it a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent5: The weirdness of the painting captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The condition of being strange or unusual.
meanings.sent1: The weirdness of the weather patterns puzzled the scientists.
meanings.sent2: His weirdness sometimes makes it hard to understand him.
meanings.sent3: The weirdness of the cat wearing sunglasses made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The weirdness of the glowing mushrooms in the forest was enchanting.
meanings.sent5: The weirdness of the alien's language fascinated the linguists.
